Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE PPG PLACE, PITTSBURGH, Pennsylvania, 15222, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kraft merged with Heinz to create the third- largest food and beverage manufacturer in North America behind PepsiCo and Nestle and the fifth- largest player in the world. Beyond its namesake brands, the combined firm's portfolio includes Oscar Mayer, Velveeta, and Philadelphia. Outside North America, the firm's global reach includes a distribution network in Europe and emerging markets that drive around one fifth of its consolidated sales base, as its products are sold in more than 190 countries and territories.
